name: created_at
description: Timestamp of when the Tweet was created

name: is_favorited
description: Whether the Tweet has been favorited

name: is_retweeted
description: Whether the Tweet has been retweeted

name: favorite_count
description: The number of times the Tweet has been favorited

name: retweet_count
description: The number of times the Tweet has been retweeted

name: user_name
description: Name of the user who made the Tweet

name: user_location
description: Location of the user who made the Tweet

name: user_favorites_count
description: The number of favorites for the user who made the Tweet

name: user_statuses_count
description: The number of Tweets ever made by the User who made the Tweet

name: user_listed_count
description: The number of times the User who made the Tweet appears on lists
